slide_start.title: Pitch Interiorly/2024
slide_start.subtitle: Interior Design Concepts Powered by Artificial Intelligence

slide_problem.title: Current Challenge

problem_1.title: Complexity
problem_1.text: Designing living spaces is complex and requires understanding of both aesthetic and functional requirements.

problem_2.title: Creativity
problem_2.text: Interior design can be overwhelming due to its complexity and the multitude of decisions and options available.

problem_3.title: Cost
problem_3.text: High costs deter many from redesigning their living spaces. Most people don't have the budget to hire an interior designer.

slide_problem.summary:
The market lacks user-oriented
design tools.

slide_solution.title: Our Solution
slide_solution.subtitle: Breathtaking Interior Concepts Through AI in Seconds

feature_1.title: Image Generation
feature_1.subtitle: Text-based image generation powered by SDXL.

feature_2.title: Shared Workspace
feature_2.subtitle: Collaborative workspace as a central hub for teamwork.

feature_3.title: Real-time Collaboration
feature_3.subtitle: Joint editing of files in real-time.

feature_4.title: Semantic Search
feature_4.subtitle: Semantic search across all files and content.

slide_vision.title: Our Vision
slide_vision.vision: Our goal is to become the leading destination for interior design solutions for both businesses and individuals.
